about_the_game:
Turbo Live is a party game where you must survive in a world where drivers don’t respect anything. The concept of the game is simple: you need to guide a group of pedestrians who are a bit dumb and clumsy through traffic without getting them run over.

Turbo Live can be played solo like an arcade game, or live with your community like a party game. It’s up to you.

  • 🚶‍♂️ Save or crush the pedestrians
  • 🚗 Send cars onto the road or from the skies to run over the pedestrians
  • 🔔 Interact with your community or your favorite streamers, regardless of the streaming platform
  • 💥 Combine commands and come up with the most twisted strategies to cause chaos!



Are you a streamer and want to play with your community? Turbo Live is the ultimate party game to spice up your streams. Save the pedestrians or crush them via the chat, in co-op or versus mode. Grow your audience, have fun, and create connections during chaotic and unforgettable sessions! GO, GO, GO, TURBOOOOOOO LIVE!!!

🎮 Tons of Game Modes




In Turbo Live, the goal is to either crush or save the pedestrians. So far, nothing too complicated. But the game modes add a twist, a challenge, and can even completely turn the experience upside down. Imagine playing street soccer in the middle of a traffic jam. Scoring goals while avoiding getting hit won't be easy. Of course, you'll have access to several different game modes (survival, zero crash, soccer, etc.), and more are coming soon (werewolf, zombie, etc.).

🎲 Embrace the Chaos




Can you imagine giving full control to your community? Via the chat, viewers can use tons of commands to play, react, help, sabotage, troll, and support you if they're nice. And as if that wasn't enough, we've also planned random events combined with unpredictable physics to surprise you and create completely absurd situations. But don't worry! You have access to settings to customize your experience and ensure everything runs the way you want it to.

✨ Simple and accessible




Have you ever tried to play with your community but gave up because you had to explain the game rules fifty thousand times? Relax! We’ve got you covered. Turbo Live is designed so that anyone (even your grandma) can join the game midway without needing any explanations. The rules and commands are always visible on screen, making everything super accessible. And to top it off, we’ve programmed a Twitch bot that gives tips to viewers without cluttering up the chat.

The main goal is to have fun. Or to make sure your stream goes smoothly and stays dynamic. Clearly, we prefer to avoid the situation where you get lost in incomprehensible menus and endless settings. We offer two ways to play with your community:

  • 🖥 Twitch option for a quick connection to your account and straight into the game
  • 🔌 Keyboard option to assign chat commands to keyboard keys (a third-party tool is required)
  • ⚙ Feel free to check our streamer guide in the announcements for more information (it’s right above)

And don’t worry, you don’t need to be a pro gamer or a streamer with 1,000,000 followers. You just need a mouse, a decent computer (preferably not from the 80s), and you can even play solo if you want!

💬 A Message from the Developers


We are a small indie team of two passionate people, determined to offer you a fun and chaotic gaming experience, perfect for solo play or sharing live. We don't claim to offer you a 100-hour blockbuster with endless side quests. Instead, we offer you Turbo Live, a game with a unique experience that suits you.

Turbo Live is free (and always will be) and offers extensive customization thanks to DLCs. You have the freedom to install the DLCs that interest you to enrich your experience. Additionally, we are committed to continuously adding free and paid content, taking your feedback into account to improve the game over time.

💖Did you enjoy Turbo Live or want to follow the project?


  • 💌 You can provide feedback on our Discord to improve the game
  • 👉 You can join our social networks or share it with your friends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core (Intel / AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Audio headphone or audio speaker
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4.0 GHz Dual Core (Intel / AMD)
  • Graphics: At least NVIDIA GTX 650 / AMD Radeon 5000-series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Audio headphone or audio speaker
